data.author: VDM

changelog.release_notes:
1) Added support Pebble 2.
2) Added Heart Rate Monitor.
1) Added information window after the change of style.

1) Added support Pebble health:
1.1) Added daily step goal.
1.2) Added step counter on white bar.
1.3) Added step counter on money.
2) Minor bug fix.

1) Migration on SDK 3.x.
2) Added support color version.
3) Added some watchface styles.
4) Temporarily disable invert color.
5) Support changing weapons only for monochrome version.

1) Added switch the type of currency.
2) Added the ability to enter numbers in the field of date.

1) Added settings:
- The date format change.
- Changing weapons, depends on the day of the week.
- Invert color.
2) Minor bug fix.

Added "Settings" button, which configures display of information on the stars and status battery charging.
Updated stars: now can be displayed on stars - bluetooth connection state (where 1 and 5 - double vibration).

latest_release.release_notes:
1) Added support Pebble 2.
2) Added Heart Rate Monitor.

data.title: GTA Watchface
